Category A - Verification Outcome.Scenario 1: Message: The submitted document has been reviewed and appears valid. Proceed with normal processing.
Category A - Verification Outcome.Scenario 2: Message: The submitted document appears altered or invalid. Please take action according to your workflow.

Category B - Third Party Confirmation.Scenario 1: Message: The external party confirmed the information is genuine.
Category B - Third Party Confirmation.Scenario 2: Message: The external party confirmed the information is not valid.

Category C - Compliance Review.Scenario 1: Message: The provided document or marking does not meet compliance requirements.
Category C - Compliance Review.Scenario 2: Message: The provided information meets all required standards.

Category D - Document Quality.Scenario 1: Message: The provided image or file is too low quality to review accurately.
Category D - Document Quality.Scenario 2: Message: The document content is clear and readable. Proceed as normal.

Category E - Mismatched Information.Scenario 1: Message: Information in the submitted documents does not match. Please verify identifiers.
Category E - Mismatched Information.Scenario 2: Message: The submitted documents match correctly and can be accepted.

Category F - Clarification Request.Scenario 1: Message: Please provide clarification or additional information to support your submission.
Category F - Clarification Request.Scenario 2: Message: Clarification received and confirmed. Proceed with next steps.

Category G - Branding.Scenario 1: Message: The provided branding information cannot be verified.
Category G - Branding.Scenario 2: Message: The brand and identifiers are valid and verified.

Category H - Language and Translation.Scenario 1: Message: The submitted document is not in a supported language. Please provide a translation.
Category H - Language and Translation.Scenario 2: Message: Document language verified. No further action required.

Category I - Certificates and Reports.Scenario 1: Message: The report meets required standards and is valid.
Category I - Certificates and Reports.Scenario 2: Message: The report is incomplete or does not meet the requirements.

Category J - Regional Cases.Scenario 1: Message: The case applies to a specific regional requirement. Proceed with regional process.
Category J - Regional Cases.Scenario 2: Message: No regional restriction identified. Follow global process.

Category K - Product Review Checklist.Scenario 1: Message: The document checklist is complete and compliant.
Category K - Product Review Checklist.Scenario 2: Message: Missing or invalid items in the checklist. Please request updates.

Category L - Product Notification.Scenario 2: Message: Notification invalid or incomplete. Please correct and resubmit.

Category M - Product Label.Scenario 1: Message: The label contains all required information.
Category M - Product Label.Scenario 2: Message: The label is missing key details or not in the expected language.

Category N - Case Follow-Up.Scenario 1: Message: A follow-up request has been submitted and is awaiting confirmation.
Category N - Case Follow-Up.Scenario 2: Message: The follow-up process is complete. No further action required.
